Params[3]: You finally make it to the final stage of the mission, but you are met with an arduous battle.
That's quite a crowd! Nanamideon, activate!
Storm swings her chainsaw menacingly at the hostiles, even just scratching an enemy causes it to explode into scrap metal.

Params[2]: Storm is OP! How many Storms did I pull?!

Params[3]: Half of the enemies have been annihilated, while Storm only sustained minor injuries.
Regardless, the outcome of the battle still looks bleak. The reason being...

Params[2]: What's up with my team being all close-ranged...

Params[3]: Dawn, Tenebrion, Astral, and Arclight... The only long-ranged member is Blast, but sending her out will cause other issues.
Your team members are unable to get close to the last elite enemy standing firmly atop a cliff...
Rargh!!!!!
(Laughs sardonically) Are you out of options?
Rargh!! Rargh!!!

Params[2]: If we can just make it fall down...

Params[3]: Do you need it to fall?
Suddenly, the battlefield begins to shake.
Importing global variable data—complete.
The hill that the elite enemy was standing on abruptly disappears, causing it to fall to the ground.
In "Virtual Horizon", battlefield conditions will intermittently change and produce different effects to simulate a variety of battle scenarios. Looks like you got lucky.
From the hate-scorched sky, with righteous anger in our hearts! Corrupted Bane!
Storm shreds the elite enemy to pieces just as it hits the ground.
But was that change to the battlefield really... just a coincidence?
The elite enemy has been vanquished. Combat complete. Congratulations!
There's no way. This AI is just an AI. And it's from ages past, it won't help you out on its own.

Params[2]: But something doesn't seem quite right...

Params[3]: Alright, this week's test is over. Good work. I hope you keep it up next week as well.
